name: Frames4Less.com
overview: Frames4Less.com is a retail and wholesale custom picture frame business that operates out of Southern California. The company is leading innovation in the framing industry, enabling clients to order custom frame products online via the company’s website, using a framing GUI. Aside from providing B2C services online, the company offers B2C fulfillment services for clients around the globe. Frames4Less.com is currently one of the only framing companies that offers blind ship fulfillment to multiple addresses. The company is developing several innovations including its state of the art 2 day frame production pipeline and its 0Gravity consumer packaging system.
